### Dataset for Regression
```{r}
cirrhosisRegression <- cirrhosis
```


```{r}

cirrhosisRegression <- cirrhosisRegression %>%
                                        filter(Status != "D") %>%
                                                          mutate(Transplant = ifelse(Status == 'C', 0, 1 ))

```

### Logistic regression model

TransplantModel <- glm()
